sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; const Contact = () => { const [darkMode, setDarkMode] = useState(false); // Toggle Light/Dark Mode const toggleDarkMode = () => { setDarkMode(!darkMode); }; // Text-to-Speech Function const playAudio = (text) => { const speech = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance(text); speech.voice = speechSynthesis.getVoices().find( (voice) => voice.lang === "en-US" && voice.name.includes("Google") ); speech.rate = 0.9; // Slightly slower for a softer feel speech.pitch = 1; speech.volume = 1; speechSynthesis.speak(speech); }; return (
{/* Dark Mode Button */}
{/* Contact Form Section */}

Contact Us

{/* Full Name */}
{/* Email ID */}
{/* Phone Number */}
{/* Message */}
{/* Submit Button */}
{/* Text-to-Speech Example */}
{/* Footer with Social Media Icons */}
Facebook Instagram YouTube X
); }; export default Contact;
